text: niyata vaśayenma kavurun pratikṣēpa kara, (ema pratikṣēpayen nomidī) pratikṣēpa karaminma maraṇayaṭa pat vannōda, ovungen kenekuṭa mema bhūmiyehi bohō sē ratran tibī, eya (tama varadaṭa samāva labā gænīma san̆dahā ē siyalla) tamanṭa vandi vaśayen dunnada, (eya) bāra ganu labannē næta.mevænnanṭama vēdanā gena dena dan̆ḍuvam æta. movunṭa udav karannanda (ehidī) kisivekut næta
